Zahi Hawass said the looters who targeted the Cairo museum were fortunately not too bright. he told Time magazine. They looted the museum shop. Thank God they thought that the museum shop was the museum. Nine men reportedly repelled into the building through the roof. Andy Coulson survives committee hearing MPs treat Andy Coulson with considerable scepticism as he tells him them he knew nothing of the phone hacking happening during his tenure as editor of News of the World. I never condoned the use of phone hacking, nor do I have any recollection of phone hacking taking place, he insists.
